name: Eternal (BeanieBagGames)
description:
(Was meant for the lowrez jam)

Story:

The bastards tossed you into a series of mazes for their own entertainment! Dodge the enemies, and make it out alive!

Features:

  • 3 Mazes ranging in all different sizes! 20x20, 50x50, and even 100x100!!
  • Enemies to turn and run away from!
  • 64x64 resolution ;O

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Mouse - Look

Credits:

Programmer, UI Designer - Good-Trim-Tim
Composer - Me
